summary:
A small house with a bed and some storing place,
this is my first mod, so don\'t expect to much ;)
descriptionHtml:
Hello, this is the first mod I have made, and I made it mainly to get a bit understanding of how things works. It\'s not a big home and it isn\'t completely finished jet, but I\'m happy about how it have turned out so far. You find the cottage close to Half-moon mill (picture show the location)

[youtube]oEi-juDXbH4[/youtube]
Thanks to izon87604 for a nice vidoe. Video is from V 1.0

) )Description( (
Half-moon cottage is a small player home placed in the beautiful landscape around Half-moon mill
it contains:

) )Updates( (

]1.1

+ Made more lore-friendly
+ Added a road to the house
+ Added a map-marker
+ House now need key (key on table right for door)
- removed some bugs

]1.0
Uploaded mod

-Storing place
-Bed
-Cooking area
-An Enchanting Table
 
If installing manually place the esp. in C:\\Programs\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\Skyrim\\Data (the location of the Skyrim folder might vary)
You should also make an backup for you save (always smart)

It would be nice to hear what I did good, what I did bad ect.
and sorry for any English errors
author: GoldenSword
